attributes.action: get school buses for school children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Commuters are fed up of paying fares to commute to work and then not even get on the bus in the mornings because it is full of school children (who pay nothing!) Why should we not be able to get on the bus when we pay? We really need school buses for kids!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
